name: Evenium
tag_list: event-registration, online-event-management, event-apps, networking, interaction, events
overview:
Evenium provides digital and mobile solutions to bring event participants together and encourage their interaction at events and meetings.

Evenium technology works to improve events from the inside out, starting with attendees: empowering them to actively participate during events, network, become ambassadors – in order to gain measurable results from events. Evenium’s relational technology makes events more efficient in terms of relational marketing, acquisition and client fidelity.

Launched in 2011, ConnexMe (Evenium’s mobile app) provides event attendees with the opportunity to share their reactions and event content in real time during the event. With this mobile event app and it’s social media integration, attendees and sponsors can multiply networking opportunities.

Recently, the entire suite of event planning tools were added to a new site, Evenium.net; which anyone can use to sell tickets, organize and promote events of any kind: private, galas, non profit, fundraisers, conferences or industry events.

Evenium is trusted by several multinational CAC 40 companies to ensure that their corporate events leave a lasting impression.
